unit_learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate skills in communication, workplace relations, policy and procedures, visioning and strategic planning within the workplace.
Apply principles of entrepreneurship, leadership and innovation to the workplace.
Relate to and display cross-cultural sensitivity in the workplace.
Analyse and evaluate your practical experience and be able to critically appraise the experience gained.

non_scheduled_learning_activities.description: Revision of FOSC8101 and FOSE8020 materials suitable for internship tasks.

enrolment_rules.description: 40cp at 8000 level including ((FOSC804 or FOSE8010) and (FOSC805 or FOSE8020))

assessments.description: The Internship report (minimum 6000 words) summarizes all the personal, technical and firm related experiences of the student, addressing the internee’s key achievements and outcomes.
A substantive self reflection essay based on internship experience.
These weekly reflection exercises will be a series of short reports (minimum 500 Words) written by students to concisely report on reflections and learning of the week.
A log book of hours and dates worked during the period. Must be signed off by internship supervisor.

Full year 2, Weekday attendance, North Ryde

Full year 1, Special circumstances
data.description: This unit provides students the opportunity for an industry-based internship for observing real-word innovation in practice or a research internship for first-hand experience of world-leading research. The internship integrates practical experience and learning for postgraduate students within a business or organization. All students will be required to engage in at least one substantial piece of self-reflective evaluation, one major analytical project report and participate in face-to-face workshops. The placement will allow students to explore relevant issues internal to the organization such as its goals, target identification, project management, to take cutting-edge ideas in scientific disciplines from conception through development to realisation. Students will be considered for enrolment into this unit after the successful completion of the other core units.
data.title: Science Innovation Internship
